meanings.definition: A person who entertains, especially through performances or shows.
meanings.sent1: The entertainers at the circus amazed the audience with their acrobatic skills.
meanings.sent2: The entertainers at the party sang and danced to keep everyone happy.
meanings.sent3: The entertainers at the birthday party made the children laugh with their funny jokes.
meanings.sent4: The entertainers on stage painted a colorful picture of joy for the spectators.
meanings.sent5: The entertainers in the park brought smiles to the faces of all who watched.
